abstract: Modifies the date format style to use the specified month format style.

codeExamples.code:
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:00 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.abbreviated)) // Feb
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.narrow)) // F
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.defaultDigits)) // 2
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.twoDigits)) // 02
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.wide)) // February
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month()) // Feb

overview:
## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified month style.

## Discussion

Possible values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month] include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/defaultDigits], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/narrow], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/twoDigits], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/wide].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month] format styles applied to a date:

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/abbreviated] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

# month(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified month format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func month(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.Month = .abbreviated) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The month format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified month style.

## Discussion

Possible values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month] include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/defaultDigits], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/narrow], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/twoDigits], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/wide].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month] format styles applied to a date:

```swift
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:00 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.abbreviated)) // Feb
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.narrow)) // F
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.defaultDigits)) // 2
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.twoDigits)) // 02
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month(.wide)) // February
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().month()) // Feb
```

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Month/abbreviated] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

## Specifying the Date Format

- **day(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day format style.
- **dayOfYear(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day of the year format style.
- **era(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified era format style.
- **quarter(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified quarter format style.
- **week(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified week format style.
- **weekday(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified weekday format style.
- **year(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified year format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.DateStyle**: Type that defines date styles varied in length or components included.

items.description: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day format style.
